result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Sonya R Wilson
Current: 704 State Road 35, #10, Centuria, WI 54824 United States  (Effective: 01-03-2017)
Prior: 990 Aurora Avenue, Saint Paul, MN 55104 United States

Defendant Sonya R Wilson in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JB-clerk 8:51am  CASES: 16CF12/15CF427/15CF385. Agreement reached. Parties agree for no PSI. No firearms, no voting, no holding public office, If not US Citizen may face deportation. Must provide DNA sample and surcharge. AODA assessment (get a head of time). DEF to let COCC know how much assessment will be and COCC will cut a check for the amount of assessment made payable to assessment provider. 

16CF12 - Count 1: GGP. All other counts DRI.  

15CF427: DRI

15CF385 - Count 1: GGP. All other counts DRI. 

All bonds continue, sets hrg. adj 9:11am  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 17, 2016 at 09:00 am.
